sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Typography, Paper, Grid } from '@mui/material';
import COLORS from '../theme/colors';

function DashboardPage() {
  return (
    <Box p={3} bgcolor={COLORS.grisClaro} minHeight="100vh">
      <Typography variant="h4" mb={3} color={COLORS.verdeOscuro} fontWeight="bold">
        Bienvenido a POLIXAI
      </Typography>
      <Grid container spacing={3}>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Paper elevation={4} sx={{ p: 3, background: COLORS.blanco, borderLeft: `6px solid ${COLORS.verdeBrillante}` }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" color={COLORS.verdeOscuro} fontWeight="bold">Gestión de Productos</Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" color={COLORS.grisOscuro} mt={1}>
              Consulta, agrega y administra tu inventario de productos.
            </Typography>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Paper elevation={4} sx={{ p: 3, background: COLORS.blanco, borderLeft: `6px solid ${COLORS.verdeIntermedio}` }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" color={COLORS.verdeOscuro} fontWeight="bold">Gestión de Clientes</Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" color={COLORS.grisOscuro} mt={1}>
              Visualiza y administra tus clientes de manera eficiente.
            </Typography>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>
        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Paper elevation={4} sx={{ p: 3, background: COLORS.blanco, borderLeft: `6px solid ${COLORS.acentoRojo}` }}>
            <Typography variant="h6" color={COLORS.verdeOscuro} fontWeight="bold">Reportes & IA</Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" color={COLORS.grisOscuro} mt={1}>
              Accede a reportes inteligentes y funciones de IA para tu negocio.
            </Typography>
          </Paper>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default DashboardPage;
